title: Ep. 1036 - Media Matters Exposes My Dark And Sordid Past
description:
Click here to join the member exclusive portion of my show: https://utm.io/ueSEm 

Today on the Matt Walsh Show, Media Matters exposes me sordid past as an obscure shock jock morning radio host. They believe that this will be the thing that finally brings me down, but that’s not going to happen. Also, Vox admits that kids are being transitioned but argues that we have to do it for their own sake. Joe Biden declares that debate over climate change “over” because of Hurricane Ian. And a mother shows up to a school board meeting dressed like a drag queen. But she’s trying to make a point, and doing it rather brilliantly I think. 

- - -
